title: Team-Based Instructional Design for Cost Reduction in Textbook Development and Language Education Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and job-related background knowledge
context.additional_context: Team collaboration-based lecture design and open educational resource utilization in digital device-based offline classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can achieve cost reductions of over 40% compared to existing materials by applying a team-based instructional design process
Learners can design customized language learning modules utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER) and institutional repositories
Learners can achieve over 85% in formative assessment metrics during iterative instructional design improvements through peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
